name: Ritchie Tiongson
text: Some games (like DOTA nd CSGO) are notorious for their toxicity. On the other hand, 1v1 pvp you only have yourself to rely on and blame.

source_obj.text: Some games (like DOTA nd CSGO) are notorious for their toxicity. On the other hand, 1v1 pvp you only have yourself to rely on and blame.
